00032 struct FellowMem
00033 {
00034     DWORD               m_dwGUID;
00035         WORD            m_wUnk1;
00036         DWORD           m_dwLevel;              // Level
00037         DWORD           m_dwHealthTot;  // maximum Health
00038         DWORD           m_dwStaminaTot; // maximum Stamina
00039         DWORD           m_dwManaTot;    // maximum Mana
00040         DWORD           m_dwHealthCur;  // current Health
00041         DWORD           m_dwStaminaCur; // current Stamina
00042         DWORD           m_dwManaCur;    // current Mana
00043         bool            m_bShareLoot;   // share loot - 0x00 = no, 0x10 = yes
00044         std::string     m_szName;
00045         
00046         float           m_fShareOfXP;
00047         ULONG           m_timeJoin;
00048 };

00113                 bool            m_IsOpen;                       // opened/closed fellowship (allows all members to recruit) (0 = no; 1 = yes)
00114                 bool            m_ShareLoot;            // share loot among fellows (0 = no; 1 = yes)
